verses.text: Now the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* after their \w number|strong="H4557"\w*, \add to wit\add*, the \w chief|strong="H7218"\w* \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* and \w captains|strong="H8269"\w* of \w thousands|strong="H0505"\w* and \w hundreds|strong="H3967"\w*, and their \w officers|strong="H7860"\w* that \w served|strong="H8334"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* in any \w matter|strong="H1697"\w* of the \w courses|strong="H4256"\w*, which came \w in|strong="H0935"\w* and went \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w* by \w month|strong="H2320"\w* throughout all the \w months|strong="H2320"\w* of the \w year|strong="H8141"\w*, of \w every|strong="H0259"\w* \w course|strong="H4256"\w* \add were\add* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* and \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w*.

Over the \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w course|strong="H4256"\w* for the \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \add was\add* \w Jashobeam|strong="H3434"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zabdiel|strong="H2068"\w*: and in his \w course|strong="H4256"\w* \add were\add* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* and \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w*.

Of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Perez|strong="H6557"\w* \add was\add* the \w chief|strong="H7218"\w* of all the \w captains|strong="H8269"\w* of the \w host|strong="H6635"\w* for the \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*.

And over the \w course|strong="H4256"\w* of the \w second|strong="H8145"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \add was\add* \w Dodai|strong="H1737"\w* an \w Ahohite|strong="H0266"\w*, and of his \w course|strong="H4256"\w* \add was\add* \w Mikloth|strong="H4732"\w* also the \w ruler|strong="H5057"\w*: in his \w course|strong="H4256"\w* likewise \add were\add* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* and \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w*.\f + \fr 27.4 \ft Dodai: also called, Dodo\f*

The \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w captain|strong="H8269"\w* of the \w host|strong="H6635"\w* for the \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \add was\add* \w Benaiah|strong="H1141"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jehoiada|strong="H3077"\w*, a \w chief|strong="H7218"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*: and in his \w course|strong="H4256"\w* \add were\add* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* and \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w*.\f + \fr 27.5 \ft chief…: or, principal officer\f*

This \add is that\add* \w Benaiah|strong="H1141"\w*, \add who was\add* \w mighty|strong="H1368"\w* \add among\add* the \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w*, and above the \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w*: and in his \w course|strong="H4256"\w* \add was\add* \w Ammizabad|strong="H5990"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*.

The \w fourth|strong="H7243"\w* \add captain\add* for the \w fourth|strong="H7243"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \add was\add* \w Asahel|strong="H6214"\w* the \w brother|strong="H0251"\w* of \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w*, and \w Zebadiah|strong="H2069"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* him: and in his \w course|strong="H4256"\w* \add were\add* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* and \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w*.

The \w fifth|strong="H2549"\w* \w captain|strong="H8269"\w* for the \w fifth|strong="H2549"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \add was\add* \w Shamhuth|strong="H8049"\w* the \w Izrahite|strong="H3155"\w*: and in his \w course|strong="H4256"\w* \add were\add* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* and \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w*.

The \w sixth|strong="H8345"\w* \add captain\add* for the \w sixth|strong="H8345"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \add was\add* \w Ira|strong="H5896"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ikkesh|strong="H6142"\w* the \w Tekoite|strong="H8621"\w*: and in his \w course|strong="H4256"\w* \add were\add* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* and \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w*.

The \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \add captain\add* for the \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \add was\add* \w Helez|strong="H2503"\w* the \w Pelonite|strong="H6397"\w*, of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*: and in his \w course|strong="H4256"\w* \add were\add* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* and \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w*.

The \w eighth|strong="H8066"\w* \add captain\add* for the \w eighth|strong="H8066"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \add was\add* \w Sibbecai|strong="H5444"\w* the \w Hushathite|strong="H2843"\w*, of the \w Zarhites|strong="H2227"\w*: and in his \w course|strong="H4256"\w* \add were\add* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* and \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w*.

The \w ninth|strong="H8671"\w* \add captain\add* for the \w ninth|strong="H8671"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \add was\add* \w Abi-ezer|strong="H0044"\w* the \w Anetothite|strong="H6069"\w*, of the \w Benjamites|strong="H1145"\w*: and in his \w course|strong="H4256"\w* \add were\add* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* and \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w*.

The \w tenth|strong="H6224"\w* \add captain\add* for the \w tenth|strong="H6224"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \add was\add* \w Maharai|strong="H4121"\w* the \w Netophathite|strong="H5200"\w*, of the \w Zarhites|strong="H2227"\w*: and in his \w course|strong="H4256"\w* \add were\add* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* and \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w*.

The \w eleventh|strong="H6249"\w* \add captain\add* for the \w eleventh|strong="H6249"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \add was\add* \w Benaiah|strong="H1141"\w* the \w Pirathonite|strong="H6553"\w*, of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*: and in his \w course|strong="H4256"\w* \add were\add* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* and \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w*.

The \w twelfth|strong="H8147"\w* \add captain\add* for the \w twelfth|strong="H8147"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \add was\add* \w Heldai|strong="H2469"\w* the \w Netophathite|strong="H5200"\w*, of \w Othniel|strong="H6274"\w*: and in his \w course|strong="H4256"\w* \add were\add* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* and \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w*.\f + \fr 27.15 \ft Heldai: also called, Heled\f*

¶ Furthermore over the \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: the \w ruler|strong="H5057"\w* of the \w Reubenites|strong="H7206"\w* \add was\add* \w Eliezer|strong="H0461"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zichri|strong="H2147"\w*: of the \w Simeonites|strong="H8099"\w*, \w Shephatiah|strong="H8203"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Maachah|strong="H4601"\w*:
Of the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, \w Hashabiah|strong="H2811"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Kemuel|strong="H7055"\w*: of the \w Aaronites|strong="H0175"\w*, \w Zadok|strong="H6659"\w*:

Of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \w Elihu|strong="H0453"\w*, \add one\add* of the \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w*: of \w Issachar|strong="H3485"\w*, \w Omri|strong="H6018"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Michael|strong="H4317"\w*:\f + \fr 27.18 \ft Elihu: also called, Eliab\f*

Of \w Zebulun|strong="H2074"\w*, \w Ishmaiah|strong="H3460"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Obadiah|strong="H5662"\w*: of \w Naphtali|strong="H5321"\w*, \w Jerimoth|strong="H3406"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Azriel|strong="H5837"\w*:

Of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*, \w Hoshea|strong="H1954"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Azaziah|strong="H5812"\w*: of the \w half|strong="H2677"\w* \w tribe|strong="H7626"\w* of \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w*, \w Joel|strong="H3100"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Pedaiah|strong="H6305"\w*:

Of the \w half|strong="H2677"\w* \add tribe\add* of \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w* in \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w*, \w Iddo|strong="H3035"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zechariah|strong="H2148"\w*: of \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*, \w Jaasiel|strong="H3300"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Abner|strong="H0074"\w*:

Of \w Dan|strong="H1835"\w*, \w Azareel|strong="H5832"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jeroham|strong="H3395"\w*. These \add were\add* the \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* of the \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

¶ But \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w took|strong="H5375"\w* not the \w number|strong="H4557"\w* of them from \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* and \w under|strong="H4295"\w*: because the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* had \w said|strong="H0559"\w* he would \w increase|strong="H7235"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* like to the \w stars|strong="H3556"\w* of the \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w*.

\w Joab|strong="H3097"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zeruiah|strong="H6870"\w* \w began|strong="H2490"\w* to \w number|strong="H4487"\w*, but he \w finished|strong="H3615"\w* not, because there fell \w wrath|strong="H7110"\w* for \w it|strong="H2063"\w* against \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; neither was the \w number|strong="H4557"\w* \w put|strong="H5927"\w* in the \w account|strong="H4557"\w* of the \w chronicles|strong="H1697"\w* of \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*.\f + \fr 27.24 \ft was: Heb. ascended\f*

¶ And over the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w treasures|strong="H0214"\w* \add was\add* \w Azmaveth|strong="H5820"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Adiel|strong="H5717"\w*: and over the \w storehouses|strong="H0214"\w* in the \w fields|strong="H7704"\w*, in the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, and in the \w villages|strong="H3723"\w*, and in the \w castles|strong="H4026"\w*, \add was\add* \w Jehonathan|strong="H3083"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Uzziah|strong="H5818"\w*:

And over them that \w did|strong="H6213"\w* the \w work|strong="H4399"\w* of the \w field|strong="H7704"\w* for \w tillage|strong="H5656"\w* of the \w ground|strong="H0127"\w* \add was\add* \w Ezri|strong="H5836"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Chelub|strong="H3620"\w*:

And over the \w vineyards|strong="H3754"\w* \add was\add* \w Shimei|strong="H8096"\w* the \w Ramathite|strong="H7435"\w*: over the increase of the \w vineyards|strong="H3754"\w* for the \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* \w cellars|strong="H0214"\w* \add was\add* \w Zabdi|strong="H2067"\w* the \w Shiphmite|strong="H8225"\w*:\f + \fr 27.27 \ft over the increase…: Heb. over that which was of the vineyards\f*

And over the olive \w trees|strong="H2132"\w* and the sycomore \w trees|strong="H8256"\w* that \add were\add* in the low \w plains|strong="H8219"\w* \add was\add* \w Baal-hanan|strong="H1177"\w* the \w Gederite|strong="H1451"\w*: and over the \w cellars|strong="H0214"\w* of \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* \add was\add* \w Joash|strong="H3135"\w*:

And over the \w herds|strong="H1241"\w* that \w fed|strong="H7462"\w* in \w Sharon|strong="H8289"\w* \add was\add* \w Shitrai|strong="H7861"\w* the \w Sharonite|strong="H8290"\w*: and over the \w herds|strong="H1241"\w* \add that were\add* in the \w valleys|strong="H6010"\w* \add was\add* \w Shaphat|strong="H8202"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Adlai|strong="H5724"\w*:

Over the \w camels|strong="H1581"\w* also \add was\add* \w Obil|strong="H0179"\w* the \w Ishmaelite|strong="H3459"\w*: and over the \w asses|strong="H0860"\w* \add was\add* \w Jehdeiah|strong="H3165"\w* the \w Meronothite|strong="H4824"\w*:

And over the \w flocks|strong="H6629"\w* \add was\add* \w Jaziz|strong="H3151"\w* the \w Hagerite|strong="H1905"\w*. All these \add were\add* the \w rulers|strong="H8269"\w* of the \w substance|strong="H7399"\w* which \add was\add* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w David’s|strong="H1732"\w*.

Also \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w* \w David’s|strong="H1732"\w* \w uncle|strong="H1730"\w* was a \w counsellor|strong="H3289"\w*, a \w wise|strong="H0995"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, and a \w scribe|strong="H5608"\w*: and \w Jehiel|strong="H3171"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Hachmoni|strong="H2453"\w* \add was\add* with the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*:\f + \fr 27.32 \ft scribe: or, secretary\f*\f + \fr 27.32 \ft son…: or, Hachmonite\f*

And \w Ahithophel|strong="H0302"\w* \add was\add* the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w counsellor|strong="H3289"\w*: and \w Hushai|strong="H2365"\w* the \w Archite|strong="H0757"\w* \add was\add* the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w companion|strong="H7453"\w*:

And \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w Ahithophel|strong="H0302"\w* \add was\add* \w Jehoiada|strong="H3077"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Benaiah|strong="H1141"\w*, and \w Abiathar|strong="H0054"\w*: and the \w general|strong="H8269"\w* of the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w army|strong="H6635"\w* \add was\add* \w Joab|strong="H3097"\w*.
